name: absorber (K3yman)
description:
This is a submission to the GameDev.tv Jam 2022.

It's a high action, top-down shooter game where you have to survive as long as possible to reach higher scores. As you stay up longer more diverse foes will emerge with different abilities.

At the start you can't move, attack or defend. Gain abilities by succumbing or surrendering to the enemies. In this game death is only the beginning for gaining new abilities and reaching higher scores!

There are 5 unique abilities. Can you find them all?

Controls:
Movement - WASD
Attack ability - Left mouse button
Defence ability - Right mouse button

Software used in development:
Unity 2021.3.1f
Visual Studio 2021
Bosca Ceoil
Paint.net
sfxr

If you decide to play the game please leave feedback of what you think about the game and also post your highest score in the comments! 

*my personal highscore is 145
